text:
(1)
Passenger sheds and platforms of old Manhattan Bridge Street Car Line, on the Plaza of the bridge at the Bowery.

December 26, 1929.

P. L. Sperr.

(2)
Work car of the same location.

December 26, 1929.

P. L. Sperr.
title: Bridges - Manhattan Bridge - [Manhattan Bridge street car line.]
